subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Penguins’ Pascal Dupuis, playing alongside Sidney Crosby and Chris Kunitz, has shown that he is no afterthought. Dupuis has scored 13 goals this season.
snippet: The Penguins’ Pascal Dupuis, playing alongside Sidney Crosby and Chris Kunitz, has shown that he is no afterthought. Dupuis has scored 13 goals this season.
